Trade/Device Name(s): GLUCOLAB Auto-coding Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): GLUCOLAB Auto-coding Blood Glucose Monitoring System meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for GLUCOLAB Auto-coding Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative whole blood glucose measurement with auto-coding functionality.
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of glucose in whole blood to aid in diabetes management in home and clinical settings (excluding neonates), supporting alternate site testing; controls verify system performance.
